entries.title: France World Cup squad welcomed home by thousands after heroic defeat
entries.description: The French World Cup squad has been welcomed home by thousands of football fans following their dramatic defeat against Argentina.

entries.title: Donald Trump should face criminal charges over Capitol riots, January 6 committee recommends
entries.description: The committee investigating the January 6 storming of the US Capitol is recommending criminal charges against former President Donald Trump.

entries.title: Crematoriums guarded by police as China fights to hide true toll of failed zero-COVID policy
entries.description: Even first thing in the morning the crematoriums were burning in Beijing. Plumes of smoke against the cold blue sky.

entries.title: Deal struck to 'protect' third of the planet by 2030
entries.description: Nearly a third of the planet will be "protected" by 2030 under a new deal struck at the UN's COP15 biodiversity summit.

entries.title: In pictures: Argentina celebrates as Messi joins Maradona in bringing home World Cup
entries.description: Millions of Argentinians breathed a collective sigh of relief after their side's dramatic World Cup win - before letting loose on the streets of Buenos Aires in celebration.

entries.title: Arctic blast to bring temperatures of -15C to US in run-up to Xmas
entries.description: Temperatures as low as -15C (12F) are set to bring arctic conditions to large parts of the US in the run-up to Christmas, forecasters have warned.

entries.title: Elon Musk to quit as Twitter boss - if he abides by poll he launched himself
entries.description: Elon Musk will step down as Twitter boss - if he stands by his pledge to abide by the results of a poll asking users for their verdict on his tenure.

entries.title: Rescue operation after Thai navy ship sinks off the coast
entries.description: More than 70 sailors have been rescued in the Gulf of Thailand after one of the country's naval vessels was hit by strong winds.

entries.title: Argentina celebrates World Cup win through the night after 'one of the best games of all time'
entries.description: Argentinian fans have been celebrating through the night after their team won the World Cup in what some commentators have described as one of the best games in the history of the tournament.

entries.title: Eleven people seriously injured after turbulence on Hawaiian Airlines flight
entries.description: Eleven people have been seriously injured during turbulence on a Hawaiian Airlines flight.
